timeline.title: Your 14-Day Transformation Journey
timeline.subtitle: Each day builds upon the last, creating lasting change

day1.title: Foundation & Breath
day1.description: Learn basic poses and breathing techniques. Start your transformation with mindful awareness.

day2.title: Strength Building
day2.description: Build core strength with warrior poses and planks. Feel your body getting stronger.

day3.title: Flexibility Focus
day3.description: Deep stretches and hip openers. Release tension and increase mobility.

day4.title: Balance & Stability
day4.description: Tree pose and single-leg stands. Develop physical and mental balance.

day5.title: Flow Sequence
day5.description: Connect breath with movement in sun salutation variations.

day6.title: Power Practice
day6.description: Challenge yourself with stronger poses and longer holds.

day7.title: Reflection & Rest
day7.description: Gentle restorative poses and meditation. Honor your practice.

day8.title: Advanced Poses
day8.description: Introduction to arm balances and deeper backbends.

day9.title: Mindful Movement
day9.description: Slow, intentional practice focusing on alignment and awareness.

day10.title: Heart Opening
day10.description: Chest and shoulder opening poses to release emotional tension.

day11.title: Twisting & Detox
day11.description: Spinal twists to cleanse the body and improve digestion.

day12.title: Integration Practice
day12.description: Combine all learned elements in flowing sequences.

day13.title: Peak Challenge
day13.description: Advanced poses and challenging sequences. Test your limits.

day14.title: Celebration & Gratitude
day14.description: Complete your transformation journey with joy and gratitude practice.

instructor.title: Meet Your Guide
instructor.name: Maya Chen
instructor.quote: Yoga is not about perfecting poses—it's about discovering the perfect version of yourself that already exists within.
instructor.bio: Maya has dedicated over a decade to the transformative practice of yoga, specializing in therapeutic approaches that heal both body and mind. Her unique methodology combines traditional Hatha and Vinyasa flows with modern wellness science.
instructor.experience: With 12 years of teaching experience across 3 continents, Maya has helped thousands of students discover their inner strength and achieve lasting transformation.
